MCON.L.summary: Mincon Group plc designs, manufactures, sells, and services rock drilling tools and associated products worldwide. The company offers conventional down the hole hammers, bits, and pipes for various drilling industries, including production and exploration mining, water well, geothermal, construction, oil and gas, and seismic drilling; reverse circulation products; hard-rock horizontal directional drilling system to provide access for fiber optic cable laying and similar activities; rotary drilling products; and drill pipe products. It also provides tungsten carbide inserts for the mining, construction, and oil and gas industries; geotechnical and foundation drilling solutions; and after sales support and services, as well as sells third-party products. The company was formerly known as Manrock plc and changed its name to Mincon Group plc in September 2013. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Shannon, Ireland. Mincon Group plc is a subsidiary of Kingbell Company.
